<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl"># è·å–æ•°æ®
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># åˆå¹¶è¡¨
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># æ‰¾åˆ°user_idå’Œaiselçš„å…³ç³»
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># PCAé™ç»´
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">import pandas as pd
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">from sklearn import PCA
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># è·å–æ•°æ®
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">order_products = pd.read_csv(&#34;/order_product_prior.csv&#34;)
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">products = pd.read_csv(&#34;/products.csv&#34;)
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">orders = pd.read_csv(&#34;/orders.csv&#34;)
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">aisles = pd.read_csv(&#34;/aisles.csv&#34;)
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># åˆå¹¶è¡¨
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># æŒ‰ç´¢å¼•åˆå¹¶
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># order_products_prior.csv è®¢å•ä¸å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> # å­—æ®µ order_id,product_id,add_to_cart_order,department_id
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># products.csv å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> # å­—æ®µ product_id,product_name,aisle_id,department_id
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># orders.csv ç”¨æˆ·è®¢å•ä¿¡æ¯
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> # å­—æ®µ product_id,product_name,aisle_id,department_id
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># aisles.csv å•†å“æ‰€å±å…·ä½“ç‰©å“çš„ç±»åˆ«
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> # å­—æ®µ aisles_id,aisle
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># åˆå¹¶ailseså’Œproducts
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">tab1 = pd.merge(aisles, products, on=[&#34;aisle_id&#34;, &#34;aisle_id&#34;])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># åˆå¹¶tab1å’Œorder_products_prior
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">tab2 = pd.merge(tab1, order_products, on=[&#34;product_id&#34;, &#34;product_id&#34;])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># åˆå¹¶tab2å’Œorders
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">tab3 = pd.merge(tab2, orders, on=[&#34;order_id&#34;, &#34;order_id&#34;])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># æ‰¾åˆ°user_idå’Œaiselçš„å…³ç³»
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># äº¤å‰è¡¨å’Œé€è§†è¡¨
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">table = pd.crostab(tab3[&#34;user-id&#34;], tab3[&#34;aisle&#34;])
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># PCAé™ç»´
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># å®ä¾‹åŒ–
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">transfer = PCA(n_components = 0.95)
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># è°ƒç”¨fit_transfer
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">data= transfer.fit_transform(table)</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
